raw_comment:
I notice that there's a higher percentage of texts being sent to their parents for women and men however women are more prone to contact their parents vs men. I also noticed that voting in person has the lowest percentage compared to the other forms of communication. 

I wonder how big of a difference it would be comparing states or with other countries. I also wonder if this is due to whether or not they were coddled or if kids didn't have a good relationship with their parents. 

This relates because since I am going to college soon, if I dorm I would be contacting my parents more often then if I was at home and this goes for other seniors too. 

How Often Do You Call Your Parents?
ace_sentences: Women send text messages to their parents more often than men send text messages to their parents.
Men send text messages to their parents.
Women contact their parents more often than men contact their parents.
Voting in person has the lowest percentage among the forms of communication.
I wonder how big the difference is between states.
I wonder how big the difference is between countries.
I wonder whether the difference is due to coddling.
I wonder whether the difference is due to a bad relationship between children and their parents.
I am going to college soon.
I may live in a dorm.
If I live in a dorm, then I will contact my parents more often than if I live at home.
Some seniors may live in a dorm.
If a senior lives in a dorm, then the senior will contact the senior's parents more often than if the senior lives at home.
The headline is: How Often Do You Call Your Parents?
